import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, Collapse, Nav, NavItem, Jumbotron, NavbarToggler ,Button ,Modal , ModalHeader,ModalBody, FormText, FormGroup, Label,Form, Input, } from 'reactstrap'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; export class Header extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ isOpen : false, isModalOpen : false, }; this.toggleNav = this.toggleNav.bind(this); this.toggleModal = this.toggleModal.bind(this); } toggleNav(){ this.setState({isOpen : !this.state.isOpen}); } toggleModal(){ this.setState({isModalOpen : !this.state.isModalOpen}); } render() { return ( <>
